chart_description: This chart tracks the disk write operations per second for systemd services on the system and snap-amazon-ssm-agent-amazon-ssm-agent-service slices. This metric is useful for monitoring the write activity of services running on the system.

dimension_descriptions.system-slice_netdata-service: This dimension represents the systemd slice where services that are not part of snap packages are running.
dimension_descriptions.system-slice_snap-amazon-ssm-agent-amazo: This dimension represents the systemd slice where the snap package amazon-ssm-agent is running.
